title: Dolphin in the Deep
description: Mandy has been spending a lot of time in Florida at the local animal park playing with Bob and Bing, two dolphins who perform together, but when Bob dies, Mandy is concerned about Bing's future and is determined to do whatever she can to help the lonely dolphin.Mandy has been spending a lot of time in Florida at the local animal park playing with Bob and Bing, two dolphins who perform together, but when Bob dies, Mandy is concerned about Bing's future and is determined to do whatever she can to help the lonely dolphin.
author: Lucy Daniels
